incidents.name: Delays in Voice Insights Events and Metrics for SDKs

incident_updates.body: Twilio Voice Insights events and metrics for SDKs were degraded for about 2 hours between 2:00 AM and 4:08 AM Pacific Time on 10/13/2023. During this period of time customers may have experienced call summaries for client calls without details, such as browser info, client names etc.

incidents.name: Submit Ticket Button is Missing in the New Help Center

incident_updates.body:
Engineering Team reviewed the issue and confirmed that this is working as per design. Below are the suggested guidelines from the Engineering Team: Login to Console> Go to Support Center (this will launch the new Help Center (if in the pilot)) > Search > Contact Support
The Contact support button is only seen after search by:
Selecting a Support Article (these are the links that do not have the :new-window: after the title, and to be scrolled till the bottom of the article).
Or, if there are no relevant search results, scrolling to the bottom of the search results page (users may need to click view more in the results to see it).
Users who are experiencing issues submitting requests through the new Help Center site should log out of Console, and then visit our existing site at https://help.twilio.com/submit to submit a report of their problems.

We've become aware of a potential issue with Twilio console where submit ticket button is missing in the New Help Center. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively continuing to investigate the issue. As a workaround, users can continue submitting the ticket here: https://help.twilio.com/submit. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information is available.

We've become aware of a potential issue with Twilio console where submit ticket button is missing in the New Help Center. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. As a workaround, users can continue submitting the ticket here: https://help.twilio.com/submit. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information is available.

incidents.name: Automated Alert: No Customer Impact

incident_updates.body: We have fully investigated the billing issue triggered by our automated alert, and it was determined that there is no noticeable customer impact. All systems are operational.
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with billing. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Outbound Call Failures from Twilio Thailand Phone Numbers to Thailand

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing outbound call failures from Twilio Thailand Phone numbers to Thailand and the service is functioning normally at this time.

We have started seeing recovery in outbound call failures from Twilio Thailand Phone numbers to Thailand. We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are observing Outbound calls failing from Twilio Thailand Phone numbers to Thailand. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.
